AICTE IDEA LAB Placements Objective Placement Policy Placement Summary Placement Brochure Trainers Placement Gallery Contact T & P Pay Fees Youtube Channel Student Alumini Why NSRIT ? Why NSRIT (Autonomous)? Reasons beyond imagination! Education Empowered! Accredited by NAAC with ‘A’ grade The program of CSE, ECE and Mech. Engg. is accrdedired by National Board of Accreditation (NBA) QS I Gauge certified institution Recognized NSRIT as “A” Grade Institute by Govt of Andhra Pradesh 100% admission attracting premium ranks through EAPCET based merit scholarship schemes by NSRIT Industry sponsored laboratory B. Tech. (Minor) with specialization in AI, Machine Learning and Data Science B. Tech. (Part time) in CSE, CSE (AL & ML) and CSE (Data Science) for working professionals Best – in – class placement with premium placement offers ranging upto Rs. 39 LPA band Hire and train model for premium placement offers Intenships with pre-placement offers with stipend from 3rd year onwards (PAN India) Strong industry connect with industries and institutiions of national repute On Job Training (OJT) with salary perks Learning Management System On campus Boys and Girls hostel separately Modern Pedagogy for improving the Teaching-Learning Process Industry driven one credit courses every week from 2nd year onwards Best – in – class mentoring systems with students Guest Lectures/Seminars by eminent persons. Personality development, motivation and training classes by experts. Workshops, Symposiums and Technical fest conducted by student’s technical associations like VECTA, SEA, ADVAYA, ACME & Robotic Club. Startup Bootcamp at NSRIT which would function as an idea Clinic mini incubator. Professional affiliations like ACM, ASME, SAE, ISTE, IEEE, CSI, IE(I) etc…. State-of-art Labs 24×7 dispensary facility within campus. NSRIT has a strong Entrepreneurship Development Cell (EDC) to enhance Industry Relations & Placement Department and has been consistent in achieving 100% Placements for registered eligible students. A separate student welfare and guidance division headed by dean-student welfare. 300 Mbps hi-speed internet connectivity round the clock in the campus and in the hostels. Discipline is the hallmark with 100% ragging free environment. Innovative Clubs to encourage the student’s creativity like Technology forums & hobby clubs for students. Excellent facilities for all kinds of indoor & outdoor games & sports with coaches for all major games & sports. R&D Cell for exposing to latest developments and create spectrum of contemporary technologies to faculties and students. ×
